Posts.Content: Forgot to tell you I am 51 yr and in surgical menopause. Total and complete hysto.
Posts.Title: quick question about symptoms???

Posts.Content: I've had clear yellow drainage from my right breast for 6 months . I've had 2 mamos and ultra sound and they were neg. I recently have begun to have severe joint pain, especially in my fingers and worse in my thumb. Two days ago my breast drainage has turned bloody. Any help? I go to the surgeon tomorrow. Any questions I should be asking.? Any thoughts. Thanks :)
